My first non-game-jam game where we had 15 week to make the game. *Villainess x Reborn* has **2000+ downloads** and **11K+ views** as of January 2026.

The demo contains the first 5 chapters of Act I. We plan on expanding on the demo and releasing the full version in the future.

## My role

- Built mini-game template and framework
- Designed and implemented 3 mini-games
  - Book-catching
  - Fishing
  - Maze traversing
- Created the internal flag testing system for more efficient story testing
